sentences.en: Bilingual in Mandarin and English. Ability in reading technical journals and publications.
sentences.cn: 英语,中文流利. 熟读有关技术文档及刊物.

sentences.en: Both brothers were mandarin scholars , learned and rational gentlemen.
sentences.cn: 两位舅爷都是身列黉门, 读书明理的君子.

sentences.en: Excellent written and spoken Mandarin & English are a must.
sentences.cn: 必须 具备良好 的中,英文读写能力.

sentences.en: Good command of English and Mandarin , both oral and written.
sentences.cn: 具有良好的口语及书面的英语和普通话能力.

sentences.en: Good written and oral skills in both English and Mandarin Chinese.
sentences.cn: 优秀的英语和普通话水平(书面,口头).

sentences.en: I speak the Shanghai dialect and the Mandarin.
I speak the Shanghai dialect, Szechuan dialect, Cantonese and, of course , Mandarin.
sentences.cn: 我会讲上海话 、 四川话 、 广东话和国语.

sentences.en: Lakka - trees ripen two by two And mandarin - ducks die side by side.
sentences.cn: 梧桐相待老,鸳鸯会双死.

sentences.en: Mandarin - style meals usually include vegetable dishes, soups, tofu and fish.
sentences.cn: 满清菜系通常包括蔬菜盘 、 、 豆腐和鱼.

sentences.en: Mandarin lessons were the Bane of an otherwise happy school life.
sentences.cn: 我的学校生活大体上蛮快乐,唯一令我不快的就是上华文课.

sentences.en: Measures are taken to battle rising mandarin crime.
sentences.cn: 已经采取了措施来打击官员中不断上升的犯罪行为.

sentences.en: Native language Mandarin and a competence in written and spoken English.
sentences.cn: 以普通话为母语,且具备一定的书面与口头英语的能力.

sentences.en: She is a native Mandarin and fluent in English and Cantonese.
sentences.cn: 她自幼讲普通话,英语和广东话也很流利.

sentences.en: Xuanwu dialect belongs to the East Henan Section of Central Plains Mandarin.
sentences.cn: 玄武方言属于中原官话的豫东片.

phrases.tran_cn: 普通话；（中国）国语；（中国）官话
n. 厦门悦华酒店；广州东方豪城酒店

trans.tran_cn: 普通话，（旧时）中国政府的高级官员，柑橘
trans.tran_en: a kind of small orange with skin that is easy to remove
